block.p: Many services will be curtailed today since Christmas is on a Saturday. NEW YORK
GOVERNMENT OFFICES State offices and courts are open today and closed tomorrow. New York City offices are closed today.
POST OFFICE Express Mail and special delivery only, tomorrow; General Post Office open at 33d Street and Eighth Avenue. Regular mail delivery today.
Many services will be curtailed today since Christmas is on a Saturday. NEW YORK
GOVERNMENT OFFICES State offices and courts are open today and closed tomorrow. New York City offices are closed today.
POST OFFICE Express Mail and special delivery only, tomorrow; General Post Office open at 33d Street and Eighth Avenue. Regular mail delivery today.
BANKS Open today.
PARKING In New York City Sunday parking rules are in effect today and tomorrow. No garbage collection or street cleaning tomorrow.
SANITATION No pickups or street cleanings tomorrow.
SCHOOLS Closed today.
FINANCIAL MARKETS Closed today.
TRANSPORTATION Subways, buses, and the Staten Island Rapid Transit Operating Authority will operate on a Saturday schedule today and tomorrow.
The Long Island Rail Road will operate nine extra trains today. Tomorrow the L.I.R.R. will be on a weekend schedule. Extra cars will be added as necessary.
Metro-North will operate extra trains today and will be on a holiday schedule tomorrow. NEW JERSEY
GOVERNMENT OFFICES State and Federal offices and courts closed today and tomorrow.
POST OFFICES Express Mail and special delivery only, tomorrow. Today there is regular mail delivery, but some post offices may close at noon, at the discretion of the local postmaster.
BANKS Option to close today and tomorrow.
SCHOOLS Option to close today.
TRANSPORTATION Tomorrow New Jersey Transit will operate on a Sunday schedule. There will be no rail service on the Pascack Valley and Port Jervis Lines.
PATH trains will operate on a regular schedule today and be on a Sunday schedule tomorrow. CONNECTICUT
GOVERNMENT OFFICES State and Federal offices and courts are closed today and tomorrow.
POST OFFICES Express Mail and special delivery only, tomorrow. Today there is regular mail delivery, but some post offices may close at noon, at the discretion of the local postmaster.
BANKS Closed today and tomorrow.
SCHOOLS Closed.
TRANSPORTATION Metro-North will operate extra trains today and will be on a holiday schedule tomorrow.
